```
package main

import (
    "fmt"
)

func main() {
    res := 4 % 2
    fmt.Println(res)

    res = 5 % 2
    fmt.Println(res)

    res = 8 % 3
    fmt.Println(res)
}
```

```
package main

import (
    "fmt"
    "math"
)

func main() {
    res := math.Mod(4, 2)
    fmt.Println(res)

    res = math.Mod(4.2, 2)
    fmt.Println(res)

    res = math.Mod(5, 2)
    fmt.Println(res)

    res = math.Mod(-5, 2)
    fmt.Println(res)
}
```

```
package main

import (
    "fmt"
    "math"
)

func main() {
    res := math.Remainder(4, 2)
    fmt.Println(res)

    res = math.Remainder(5, 2)
    fmt.Println(res)

    res = math.Remainder(5.5, 2)
    fmt.Println(res)

    res = math.Remainder(5.5, 1.5)
    fmt.Println(res)
}
```
